text.first: The 'Luhansk Association of Organizations of Persons with Disabilities', established on May 25, 2018, supports people with disabilities and ensures equal opportunities for them. We are a leading organization in Eastern Ukraine focused on social integration and the protection of the rights of persons with disabilities, working to improve their quality of life

items.question: What is the Luhansk Association of organizations of persons with disabilities?
items.answer: LAOOI is a voluntary public association consisting of individuals and private legal entities, established to uphold and protect human and civil rights and freedoms, meeting the social, economic, cultural, and other needs of its members and/or others

items.question: How can I support your work?
items.answer: You can support us by becoming a volunteer, donating funds or materials, or helping to spread information about our association and our projects

items.question: How can I receive assistance from the association?
items.answer: To get help, you can contact us using the contact information on our website or fill out the help request form available on the site

items.question: Can I become a volunteer/partner?
items.answer: Yes, we are always happy to welcome new volunteers and partners! You can fill out the volunteer application form on our website, and we will get in touch with you to discuss collaboration opportunities

items.question: Do you provide legal or psychological support?
items.answer: Yes, we provide psychological support. The psychologists of the NGO Luhansk Association of Organizations of Persons with Disabilities actively work with people experiencing traumatic events and stress during crisis situations. Our organization understands the importance of helping those facing emotional and psychological difficulties. We offer therapeutic consultations and organize group sessions aimed at supporting psychological well-being. Participants can discuss their experiences in a safe environment, exchange experiences, and find new ways to overcome challenges. Our team of qualified psychologists and social workers provides professional assistance to help everyone restore their inner balance and strengthen their emotional health. We believe that together we can overcome all difficulties and provide reliable support for those in need

items.question: Where can I find more information about your programs and activities?
items.answer: You can find more information about our programs and events on our website in the 'News' section or by following us on our social media

posts.title: Celebrating world inclusion day: our goal is equal opportunities for all
posts.text: The GS LAOOI took part in the public discussion 'Lviv Region in Conditions of War: Challenges and Sources of Resilience', which took place on Thursday, October 17, 2024. During the event, key aspects of social resilience and cohesion in conditions of a protracted war were discussed. The main goal of the discussion was to develop a common vision of responding to new threats facing the region and its residents. The Head of the GS LAOOI Mykola Nadulichnyy took part in the discussion of important aspects of supporting public initiatives and ways to strengthen social unity in this difficult period. Follow the news about resilience and cohesion on the Facebook page. National Platform for Resilience and Cohesion.
